original_text:
because of what my enemy is saying,
    because of the threats of the wicked;
for they bring down suffering on me
    and assail me in their anger.
korean_text: 이는 원수의 소리와 악인의 압제 때문이라 그들이 죄악을 내게 더하며 노하여 나를 핍박하나이다

sentences.original_text: because of what my enemy is saying
because of the threats of the wicked
for they bring down suffering on me
and assail me in their anger
